colombia_08_07.title: Battle of Boyacá
colombia_08_07.content:
August 7th commemorates the Battle of Boyacá, a crucial event in Colombia's independence. It was the battle that sealed the country's independence.

This day is a national holiday and is celebrated with parades and civic acts throughout the territory.

colombia_07_20.title: Colombian Independence Day
colombia_07_20.content:
July 20th commemorates the Colombian Declaration of Independence, a fundamental milestone in the country's history. This day marks the beginning of the independence process.

It is celebrated with great patriotic fervor, military parades, and cultural events.

colombia_01_01.title: New Year's Day
colombia_01_01.content: January 1st celebrates New Year's Day, marking the beginning of a new year. It is a day of celebration and reflection in Colombia.

usa_07_04.title: U.S. Independence Day
usa_07_04.content:
The 4th of July celebrates Independence Day in the United States, commemorating the Declaration of Independence of 1776. It's a day of festivities, fireworks, and family gatherings.

It is one of the most important national holidays in the country.

usa_01_01.title: New Year's Day
usa_01_01.content: January 1st marks New Year's Day, celebrating the beginning of a new year. It's a day of reflection and celebration across the United States.
